main.name: Rami Taleb
main.description: An Ottawa based Software Engineering student.
main.bio: I am currently a fourth year Software Engineering student at the University of Ottawa, two study semesters and one CO-OP term away from graduating. 21 years young and I have been interested in technology for as long as I can remember. I am always looking to improve my knowledge in tech and to improve myself as a person. Previously employed by IBM, CENX and uOttawa SASS-IT. Some of my interests include but are not limited to back-end development, entrepreneurship, hackathons, machine learning and soccer.

education.degree: Software Engineering (Engineering Management and Entrepreneurship, CO-OP)
education.description: Awarded Engineering Merit scholarship and placed on Dean’s Honour List. Member of uOttawa’s Software Engineering Student Association.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Assisted in the development of Storytelling in Cognos Analytics working mostly on the front end using JavaScript. Developed in NodeJS to implement fixes to a multitude of defects including playback issues, data-widget, copy/paste, undo/redo defects and more. After ramping up with the product began to implement whole features. Interfaced with the design team to ensure features improved the UX. Wrote functional UI-based tests using Selenium for Storytelling's core features.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Used Clojure as a functional programming language to resolve network related issues regarding visualizations, alarms and more to improve for one of the top 3 mobile providers within the US. Worked on a new project involving big data manipulation. Wrote parsers using Nifi to format data being streamed into the product. Actively participated in daily standups, biweekly sprints and retrospectives.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Assisted in the development of Ventus, a web-based student services application for Student Academic Success Service of the University of Ottawa. Performed significant re-engineering of software architecture by implementing object-oriented software engineering practices in PHP and JavaScript. Worked to improve the SDLC by introducing the team to Github Project Boards. Maintained the project board regularly. Assisted in project planning, requirement prioritization, feature development, and peer review of code.
